item.title: Wireshark: A quick troubleshoot on slow network (1)
item.description: Table of Contents Quick drill into errors and connection issues Identify the protocols with high traffic Get the connection speed to a site Get the time spent in waiting for a response Identify the bad packets (TCP errors) ratio Generate the statistic:- runs wireshark and starts capturing the network packets until the statistic builds. Quick drill into errors and connection issues Navigates to 'Analyze' â†’ 'Expert Info' , a high number of errors and warnings indicates problems.
